pullRequest.title: Ensure that TestResourceManager is only closed once
pullRequest.bodyText:
Without this PR the TestResourceManager gets closed 3 times,
which is causing some issues with new surefire versions
Relates to: #10081

nodes.bodyText: Removed because the TestResourceManager gets closed as part of JUnit 5's closing of the ExtensionState.
Removed because the shutdownTask gets closed as part of JUnit 5's closing of the ExtensionState.

commit.message:
Ensure that TestResourceManager is only closed once

Without this PR the TestResourceManager gets closed 3 times,
which is causing some issues with new surefire versions

Relates to: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/10081

commit.message:
Avoid doing any xstream related work unless absolutely necessary

Relates to: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/10081

nodes.bodyText: By removing the interface, we ensure that JUnit does not attempt to close this, because we are closing it ourselved
